Title: Relates to determination of public convenience and advantage
Summary: Provides that the liquor authority shall not consider the financial impact on, or any objections made by, competing existing licensees in the determination to grant a license to operate a liquor store.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to determinations by the authority with regard to licenses to sell liquor and/or wines for consumption off the premises
